/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, filled with cars and people, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is a clear blue, contrasting with the greenery of the trees lining the street. In the background, buildings rise up, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of Beijing. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
